story.headline: GET READY (feat. ADD/ADHD)
story.text:
You somehow forgot the time and now its only 20 minutes, 
before you have to leave the house. 
You are planning to meet up with some friends, 
but because you are virtually ready to go, there is no need to hurry.

sleeping-room.description:
You are standing in your sleeping room. 
It's a littlebit messy. You plan to tidy up, as soon, 
as you come back home. ... Or perhaps in the next few days. 
Wait, didn't you think about this last week?

You look around and you see the following things you can interact with. 
Name them to interact.

some shirts.smell: recently the weather was pretty hot. the smell sweaty.

Making your bed: You made your bed. Wich is good. But it took 3 mins.

living-room.description:
You are in your living room. 
20 Minutes left. Normally to early to leave. 
But not enough time to start a new task. 
Your laptop is still running. 
Should you check for the bus connection again?

your computer.shut down: Perfect, you didn't waste any time.
check for bus connection:
A new video on youtube from a channel you really like. 
Oh, no. 12 Minutes are gone! Where has the time gone.
